details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.5.3 Annotation dictionaries - Normal appearance
details.description: For all annotation dictionaries containing an AP key, the appearance dictionary that it defines as its value shall contain only the N key. If an annotation dictionaryâ€™s Subtype key has a value of Widget and its FT key has a value of Btn, the value of the N key shall be an appearance subdictionary; otherwise the value of the N key shall be an appearance stream.

rule.description: For all annotation dictionaries containing an AP key, the appearance dictionary that it defines as its value shall contain only the N key. If an annotation dictionary's Subtype key has a value of Widget and its FT key has a value of Btn, the value of the N key shall be an appearance subdictionary; otherwise the value of the N key shall be an appearance stream.
rule.test: AP == null || ( AP == "N" && ( ((Subtype != "Widget" || FT != "Btn") && N_type == "Stream") || (Subtype == "Widget" && FT == "Btn" && N_type == "Dict") ) )

error.message: Annotation's appearance dictionary contains entries other than N or the N entry has an invalid type
